sentences.english: Over the past few years, it has constantly made some explorations in the construction of the Communist Party in urban community.
sentences.chinese: 近年来天宁区在社区党建方面不断尝试突破。

sentences.english: Tianning Temple gained far-flung fame because of this, and. was given the honor of one of Four Famous Temples in Central Plains.
sentences.chinese: 天宁寺由此名声远播，被冠以中原四大名寺之一。

sentences.english: Sansheng Tower in Tianning Temple is located on the old sites of Tianning Temple which is on the east of Qinhuai Road, Qinyang City.
sentences.chinese: 天宁寺三圣塔位于沁阳市覃怀东路天宁寺旧址上。
